.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkExternalMemoryImageCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_IMAGE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkExternalMemoryImageCreateInfo-handleTypes-parameter]] pname:handleTypes must: be a valid combination of elink:VkExternalMemoryHandleTypeFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkExternalMemoryImageCreateInfo-handleTypes-requiredbitmask]] pname:handleTypes must: not be `0`
